Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Infectra: Sounds interesting. I got that. I have good memory...I hope! *Inf=
ectra said joking* Infectra: Who else is going to teach me something?
  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:33 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Okay, fi=
rst it's Stranato's turn, he'll show you combat and stuff." Train Wreck sai=
d. The others nodded and walked back into the base. Stranato turned to Infe=
ctra.

  "So, first of all, if someone fires at you, use something for ptot=
ection, you can grab a rock or something, because around here, lots of powe=
rful weapons are used, stay away from Heavy Blaster Rifles if your not the =
one holding them! Okay, watch this." Stranato said. He propped a dummy up o=
n his back. He swung his foot backwards and kicked the dummy in the groin. =
Stranato then hit a belly to belly suplex on the dummy.

  "Now, if somethi=
ng happens, like you getting into a bunch of trouble, play dead, they come =
close, bam! You blow their guts out!" Stranato said. Stranato fired his eye=
 beams into the sky. Stranato did a moonsault from the top of a rock.

  "N=
ever forget to surprise your opponent!" Stranato said.

  "Oh, yeah, don't =
argue with the leaders, they get mad, and all the bases have autoguns and s=
hields, watch out for them." Stranato said. Stranato hopped onto a rock.

 =
 "Pick your weapons carefully, and never let your guard down, your best fri=
ends could be your enemy!" Stranato said.

  "Protect the Ark, yeah, I know=
, we don't fight for any reasons but our own, but if the Autobots get destr=
oyed, you cease to exist! Oh, yeah, kick ass and win Olympic Gold!" Stranat=
o said. Stranato nodded and laughed...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
  From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, June=
 30, 2000 5:21 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra stands up=
 and follows the Radicons* Infectra: I want you to show everything importen=
t. Every detail please. *Infectra says to the Radicons*
      ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      S=
ent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:39 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
  "Okay, Airbomber will teach you about some stuff first." Train Wreck said=
.

      "Okay, we are on the planet Earth, we are with the Maximlas, and w=
e are trying to destroy the Predacons and Alliance, but however, right now =
we are at truce, so our enemies are the Newcomers right now." Airbomber sai=
d.

      "Yeah, Airbomber got it right, stupid truce. Well, anyway, to be =
successful in the Neo Beast Wars, you have to know the fine arts, come outs=
ide and let us show you." Stranato said. The Radicons walked out the door, =
motioning for Infectra to come along...
        ----- Original Message ----=
- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        S=
ent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:09 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
      *Infectra looked at them all* Infectra: What's so horrid about this p=
lace? You must teach me, please. *Infectra sits up and looks at them waitin=
g for some tips*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: TH=
ECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, June 29,=
 2000 11:17 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Train Wrec=
k looks at her.

          "Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me like when we got=
 out spark shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out your spark a=
nd snuck it in, somebody must have hated you alot, but don't worry, yuor sa=
fe with us now." Train Wreck said.

          "Be careful, I tried to kill =
a guy." Stranato said.

          "Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbomb=
er said.

          "It seems you don't know about the war, you were peacef=
ul on Cybertron, so lets teach you what to do to stay alive on this horrid =
planet." Train Wreck said.

          "Yeah, first of all, ya gotta drink t=
his stuff!" Stronghold said to Infectra, taking a big gulp of beer.

      =
    "Yeah, and you smoke these!" Blender said, smoking a cigar. Train Wreck=
 walked up and slapped them both in the back of the head.

          "I can=
 help, I love to help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks over and smokes a cigar=
, blowing some smoke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck comes up behind Arrow =
and taps his shoulder. Arrow turns around and Train Wreck slaps him in the =
face.

          "Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they don't know any be=
tter." Train Wreck said to Infectra...
            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
            Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:05 PM
            Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


            *The Bots optics open and she looks around*=
 Infectra:...where am I????.......the last thing I remember I was seeing my=
 friedns go plunging to the floor and then this large bot sends this claw o=
ut at me....but......that's all I remember..... *She says to particular bot=
*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
=
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, June 29=
, 2000 10:50 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              O=
CC: I talked to Orchid and she said she wanted a new character to be made f=
rom Drazom, but she didn't want it to be anything like Drazom.
            =
   
              Train Wreck works on Drazom. He looks at all of the spark=
s they had in storage.

              "Now how did this one get in here? Th=
is spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train Wreck said.

              "So h=
ow did it get in there?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the =
spark, curious to find out who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazo=
m, which was remade into whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks=
 nothing like Drazom. Train Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the=
 robot to come to life...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
             From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:21 PM
                Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                (OOC: I want to bring in a new c=
haracter. I already have an idea..)
                  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:08 PM
          =
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  Stranato was confus=
ed now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he should have =
been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect, he froze =
to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job he hated. Stranato =
picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radicon's wrecked ship, =
which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body on a table.

       =
           "Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve us=
." Stranato said.

                  "I don't think so, his spark looks to =
be extinguished, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.=


                  "I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranato said.

       =
           "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to death, just sorry he =
didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

                  "No, you don't unders=
tand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't understand =
why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He si=
ghed.

                  "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

                  "=
No, you are acting stupid now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your inte=
lligence circuits and your logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting S=
tranato.

                  "I hope your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck=
 looked at the body.

                  "We could always put a new spark in=
 his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

      =
            "We could have used him, and instead we let him die and didn't =
save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

                =
  OCC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark collecti=
on (From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new charac=
ter with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body an=
d you can bring in a new character without having him or her look like Draz=
om at all, your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body even, ju=
st pick something, please...
                    ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
 =
                   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *The k=
nife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It was already snowin=
g which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring out of his back* Dr=
azom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn't really the knif=
e. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies there......and mut=
ters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's optics flicker and fa=
de out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....That was a queston that wo=
uld never be answered*





                    (OOC: Please Drazom on the =
Deceased bots page. as that he died from the lack of emch fluid and because=
 of how cold it was)
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                    From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
                      Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
         =
             Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      The Radico=
ns had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back and they =
seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

                      "There's the guy =
I saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

                 =
     "I don't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato w=
alked up behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he ha=
d stolen from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming t=
oward Drazom's back.

                      Stronghold and Blender took a s=
ip of their beer.

                      "Why does that guy want to die, th=
ough?" Arrow asked.

                      "Some bots are crazy." Train Wre=
ck said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...
                        ----- =
Original Message ----- 
                        From: ilovealllizards 
    =
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: W=
ednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
                        Subject: Re: Neo Be=
ast Wars


                        *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks =
at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of.=
...messing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remember=
s something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Draz=
om pulls hisself up by a tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and=
 he falls back to the ground shivering from how cold it is getting from the=
 lack of mech fluid*
                          ----- Original Message -----=
 
                          From: THECODE 
                          To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10=
:59 PM
                          Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                =
          Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold=
 run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off=
 with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist l=
aughed and ran after them as well.

                          "Know what my=
 names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

            =
              "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out=
 to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

                     =
     "We left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold s=
aid.

                          "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

                =
          "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so a=
re the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

                         =
 The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that no=
ne of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The Pe=
ople's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

                 =
         "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                     =
     "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                          "Ne=
ver mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and=
 ushered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

            =
              Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

            =
              "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will stil=
l show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

  =
                        "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon scr=
eamed.

                          Dracona didn't hear and landed next to th=
e People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all =
entered the Poeple's base through the secret passage way, the computer reco=
nizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

   =
                       "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train W=
reck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

        =
                  "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and=
 it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed=
 this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Strongho=
ld and Blender followed.

                          "Wait up guys!" Arrow c=
alled out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically up=
on order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room to sort=
 out their problems. There was alot of banging, but it eventually stopped. =
Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a table to pla=
y cards with Dracona.

                          "Oh, man! Not even a drop =
of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold said.

       =
                   "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender sai=
d.

                          "I have more needs than all of you idiots put=
 together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

       =
                   "How come we can't all get along! I don't like it in her=
e neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going to kill hi=
m. Arrow cowered in the corner.

                          "You see? That's=
 why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid ru=
les! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

                          "Ye=
ah, and nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airb=
omber said.

                          Stranato sighed in disapointment. Ar=
row stood up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender sta=
rted to look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty o=
f water in this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and A=
irbomber, and Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

            =
              "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing =
to do, and--"

                          "Shut up and get your ass over her=
e! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato w=
alks over and sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.=


                          Plintissa and Dracona smile to each other and w=
alk up and out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...

--=

-
